reviewText: I enjoyed this shorter performance but with the jokes and insights and charismatic persuasions seemed to be a diluted version of the powerfulPaul Mooney: Know Your History, Jesus Was Blackwhich would make my list of go to gifts.The most charming part of this show was 40 minutes into the show when he defines "crazy People" sitting in the middle of the freeway - that was his cutest moment in the whole show and not coincidentally was part of a rant about vicious mass murderers claiming insanity like Norman Bates in Psycho because as with Jesus is Black, Paul Mooney tells you that he will KILL you for raping a child.
summary: Good but not as stellar as Jesus Is Black
Title: N/A

reviewText: I like almost anything with Paul Mooney in it or comedy that he has anything to do with, so this cd is very good in my opinion. His humor is a little raw and blunt, but he tells the exxagerated truth to the point that you can't help laughing. I would recommed this cd.
summary: Paul Mooney: Its the End of the World

reviewText: Even though Mr. Mooney's comedy is off the cuff he is still the best comedian because he makes racism ridiculous for everybody.  We can all laugh at ourselves.  He was Richard Pryor's right hand man and I can see why good comedy is still possible.  He doesn't mince words and makes everybody laugh in his own unique way.  If you cannot laugh at yourself through his sense of humor than you cannot understand being in America!!!
Title: N/A
